text: Phyllanthus sponiifolius is a species of plant in the family Phyllanthaceae. It is native to Colombia and Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. ==References== sponiifolius Category:Flora of Colombia Category:Flora of Ecuador Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Johannes Müller Argoviensis
title: Phyllanthus sponiifolius
